You are hungry! Let's cook a delicious meal. Check the cookbook in the kitchen for the recipe. Once done, enjoy your meal!

-= Kitchen =-
Guess what, you are in the place we're calling the kitchen.

You can see a fridge. You make out an oven. You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a table. The table is massive. Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a counter. On the counter you see a cookbook and a knife. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this! You can see a stove. You wonder idly who left that here. But the thing is empty. You make a mental note to not get your hopes up the next time you see a stove in a room.

You are hungry! Let's cook a delicious meal. Check the cookbook in the kitchen for the recipe. Once done, enjoy your meal!

-= Kitchen =-
Guess what, you are in the place we're calling the kitchen.

You can see a fridge. You make out an oven. You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a table. The table is massive. Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a counter. On the counter you see a cookbook and a knife. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this! You can see a stove. You wonder idly who left that here. But the thing is empty. You make a mental note to not get your hopes up the next time you see a stove in a room.

You are hungry! Let's cook a delicious meal. Check the cookbook in the kitchen for the recipe. Once done, enjoy your meal!

-= Kitchen =-
Guess what, you are in the place we're calling the kitchen.

You can see a fridge. You make out an oven. You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a table. The table is massive. Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a counter. On the counter you see a cookbook and a knife. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this! You can see a stove. You wonder idly who left that here. But the thing is empty. You make a mental note to not get your hopes up the next time you see a stove in a room.

You are hungry! Let's cook a delicious meal. Check the cookbook in the kitchen for the recipe. Once done, enjoy your meal!

-= Kitchen =-
Guess what, you are in the place we're calling the kitchen.

You can see a fridge. You make out an oven. You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a table. The table is massive. Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a counter. On the counter you see a cookbook and a knife. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this! You can see a stove. You wonder idly who left that here. But the thing is empty. You make a mental note to not get your hopes up the next time you see a stove in a room.

-= Kitchen =-
Guess what, you are in the place we're calling the kitchen.

You can see a fridge. You make out an oven. You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a table. The table is massive. Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a counter. On the counter you see a cookbook and a knife. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this! You can see a stove. You wonder idly who left that here. But the thing is empty. You make a mental note to not get your hopes up the next time you see a stove in a room.

-= Kitchen =-
Guess what, you are in the place we're calling the kitchen.

You can see a fridge. You make out an oven. You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a table. The table is massive. Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a counter. On the counter you see a cookbook and a knife. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this! You can see a stove. You wonder idly who left that here. But the thing is empty. You make a mental note to not get your hopes up the next time you see a stove in a room.

-= Kitchen =-
Guess what, you are in the place we're calling the kitchen.

You can see a fridge. You make out an oven. You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a table. The table is massive. Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a counter. On the counter you see a cookbook and a knife. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this! You can see a stove. You wonder idly who left that here. But the thing is empty. You make a mental note to not get your hopes up the next time you see a stove in a room.

You are hungry! Let's cook a delicious meal. Check the cookbook in the kitchen for the recipe. Once done, enjoy your meal!

-= Kitchen =-
Guess what, you are in the place we're calling the kitchen.

You can see a fridge. You make out an oven. You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a table. The table is massive. Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. You lean against the wall, inadvertently pressing a secret button. The wall opens up to reveal a counter. On the counter you see a cookbook and a knife. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this! You can see a stove. You wonder idly who left that here. But the thing is empty. You make a mental note to not get your hopes up the next time you see a stove in a room.
